verses.verse: And the king <WH4428> Ahasuerus <WH325> laid <WH7760> a tribute <WH4522> upon <WH5921> the land, <WH776> and upon the isles <WH339> of the sea. <WH3220>

And all <WH3605> the acts <WH4639> of his power <WH8633> and of his might, <WH1369> and the declaration <WH6575> of the greatness <WH1420> of Mordecai, <WH4782> whereunto <WH834> the king <WH4428> advanced <WH1431> him, are they <WH1992> not <WH3808> written <WH3789> in <WH5921> the book <WH5612> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Media <WH4074> and Persia? <WH6539>

For <WH3588> Mordecai <WH4782> the Jew <WH3064> was next <WH4932> unto king <WH4428> Ahasuerus, <WH325> and great <WH1419> among the Jews, <WH3064> and accepted <WH7521> of the multitude <WH7230> of his brethren, <WH251> seeking <WH1875> the wealth <WH2896> of his people, <WH5971> and speaking <WH1696> peace <WH7965> to all <WH3605> his seed. <WH2233>
